title: FS:  N28 Allen & Ginter John Ward SGC 20 1.5 HOF
author: CW

posts.post_title: NLFS:  N28 Allen & Ginter John Ward SGC 20 1.5 HOF
posts.post_content:
NLFS, shipping included.  

From the front, card appears at least Ex-MT 6-ish, but paper loss on reverse knocks it down to a 1.5.  (3 minor spots of paper loss and faint staining from possible scrapbook glue residue -- front image is very nice in hand).  Oh, and thanks for looking!  :cool:
